src_text: NSA zawn shi gaw Carter hpe Mungkan bungli magam ni hpe sumtsan kasa lam hku na jum lang ai lam, shaning 1978 na Camp David Accords myit hkrum lam; shaning 1970 hpang daw de na US hte Miwa a kanawn mazum ai lam hpe dingyang bai shabyin lu na matu myit sawn ai lam ni, shaning 1979 hta Iran bawng galai ai mang hkang hpe byin pru shangun ai Iran mungshawa gumlang ai lam hte shaning 1979 hta Afghanistan ginra de Soviet munghpawng hpung ni hku nna shang gasat ai lam zawn re ai ni hta karum shingtau lai wa sai re.
ref_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
hyp_text: The NSA helped Carter to broker a peace treaty between Israel and Egypt in 1978, known as the Camp David Accords; in the 1970s, the US and the Soviet Union were in a state of détente, but in 1979, the Iranian Revolution occurred, and the Iran hostage crisis happened, and in 1979, the Soviet Union invaded Afghanistan, leading to a deterioration in relations and a return to Cold War tensions.

src_text: "Sha tsaw" ngu ai gaw nang hku na dawraw shingna hpe ndung de htu hpang na ngu ai re, "sha yu" ngu ai gaw dawraw shingna hpe shu nten kaw (nang dawraw shingna lang da ai shara) na agan sha yu ai ngu ai re.
ref_text: Up means you should start at the tip and push the bow, and down means you should start at the frog (which is where your hand is holding the bow) and pull the bow.
hyp_text: The phrase 'sha tsaw' means to give something to someone as a gift, while 'sha yu' means to give something to someone as a debt, or in other words, to lend something to someone.

src_text: Dawraw shingna (bow) lawu maga de nsen kaba ai hpe shapraw ai shaloi, (bow) lahta maga gaw nsen kaji ai hpe shapraw ai.
ref_text: An up-bow usually generates a softer sound, while a down-bow is stronger and more assertive.
hyp_text: When you (bow) hold the upper part of the bow, you will learn to shoot, and when you (bow) hold the lower part of the bow, you will learn to aim.

[Jingpho]: Lai wa sai century law law hta, masha ni gaw hkraw ni hpe atsawm lung mai ai shara ni shachyaw, lung mai ai lakang ni galaw nna panglai hpe mu lu na matu galaw ma ai.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Jingpho]: Trans-Alaska hka lawng ladat a deng 800 ram hpe gaw Alaska a dingdung Fairbanks kaw na sau wahtawng hkying hku hkaw mat ai majaw pat hkum da hkrum ai re.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Jingpho]: Belgium na ya aten ni gaw Luxembourg na moi na aten ni re raitim Belgian gaw shaning 1830 Belgian Revolution hpang byin wa ai re.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}
